New Records: Dinesh Karthik scored his maiden T20I half-century
Key Match Events: Avesh Khan returned his career-best figures with 4/18
South African batters faltered and collapsed to 87 for nine in 16.5 overs
Ruturaj Gaikwad, Ishan Kishan, and Rishabh Pant were dismissed early in the innings
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa won their fourth toss in as many games
Quinton de Kock made a welcome return for South Africa
Post-Match Reflections: Temba Bavuma retired hurt due to an injury to his left elbow
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series is now level 2-2 with the decider to be played in Bengaluru on Sunday
Others: The pitch remained tricky to bat on even in the second innings
